thread.title: Hydropower schemes: guidelines and applying for permission (The Environment Agency)
thread.title_full: Hydropower schemes: guidelines and applying for permission (The Environment Agency) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Hydropower schemes: guidelines and applying for permission (The Environment Agency)
text: ( Source : The Environment Agency ) Hydropower schemes harness the energy from flowing water to generate electricity, using a turbine or other device. Developing a hydropower scheme involves obtaining permissions from several organisations.
